title: Hillary Clinton Tries to Mock Trump Letter, Ends Up Stepping In It
text:
It’s not clear what’s going on with Hillary Clinton in the last few days.

With her tussle with Rep. Tulsi Gabbard (D-HI), she seems to have completely lost her mind. We mean even more so than usual.

First, she suggested that Gabbard was a “Russian asset” and that Gabbard was likely being groomed to run as a third party candidate to help President Donald Trump win. When Gabbard roasted her in response calling her “queen of the warmongers,” Clinton dropped out of attendance at an event that would have had Gabbard at it.

Now, in an effort to mock the letter that Trump sent to Turkey’s President Recep Erdogan, she posted this:

Found in the archives… pic.twitter.com/iFFeqloYHM — Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) October 20, 2019

Seriously? This was the Democrats’ 2016 candidate? This is the best they have?

When you’ve lost the liberal media…

AP guy:

Washington Post fact checker:

Sometimes silence is golden https://t.co/1SkSbzJKIM — Glenn Kessler (@GlennKesslerWP) October 20, 2019

Politico:

I can't believe we all have to be alive during such a stupid time https://t.co/CpClF6TvB0 — Eric Geller (@ericgeller) October 20, 2019

And it wasn’t even original. As in she ripped off Jimmy Kimmel. But Kimmel wasn’t a Democratic candidate for president.

Didn’t even realize Hillary’s team had taken this letter from a Kimmel bit. https://t.co/dgAM7GsWCC pic.twitter.com/k2BDLzXQPN — Matt Whitlock (@mattdizwhitlock) October 20, 2019

Others also chimed in.

Found in the archives…https://t.co/zijOC0ejXW — random thoughts (@musings_n) October 20, 2019

Wipe the server with a cloth? pic.twitter.com/83HLzwSuZY — Rich Weinstein (@phillyrich1) October 20, 2019

Found in the archives pic.twitter.com/FgDzo7QBfn — MonstersMash (@cachosmash) October 20, 2019

Not found in the archives 33,000 emails about "yoga" that were under Congressional Subpoena. https://t.co/hqQOmCBR6r — Carpe Donktum🔹 (@CarpeDonktum) October 20, 2019

Is Hillary every going to get over the burn of losing? Doesn’t seem like it.

HT: Twitchy
description: Hillary Clinton Tries to Mock Trump Letter, Ends Up Stepping In It
